title: Image Slider
shortDescription: Add a slideshow gallery to your site.
longDescription:
**About** An effective way to showcase your images in a compact space is to group them as a slideshow. This way customers can engage with your content freely. Our app is perfect for displaying many hero images at once. This makes it easier to promote several products or campaigns at the same time. The pagination can be toggled between vertical and horizontal orientation. Additionally you can enable next-prev navigation to give users more control.
**Standard Features** * Use an existing layout or create a new one. * Top customer support. * Add up to 3 photos.
author: Widgetic

products.title: Basic
products.longDescription:
**Standard Features**

- Use an existing layout or create a new one.
- Top customer support.
- Add up to 3 photos.

products.title: Premium
products.shortDescription: Removes all the constraints when customizing the layout and hides our branding.
products.longDescription:
**All Standard Features plus:**

- **No Branding** - _our Widgetic branding is removed_
- **Unlimited Items** - _add more than 3 images_
- **Animation Type** - _set the animation style between items_
- **Font Style** - _specify the pagination's font properties_

- Use an existing layout or create a new one.
- Top customer support.
- Add up to 3 photos.

products.title: Premium
products.shortDescription: Removes all the constraints when customizing the layout and hides our branding.
products.longDescription:
**All Standard Features plus:**

- **No Branding** - _our Widgetic branding is removed_
- **Unlimited Items** - _add more than 3 images_
- **Animation Type** - _set the animation style between items_
- **Font Style** - _specify the pagination's font properties_

href.description: Select a page to open on image click.
href.title: Web Address

target.description: Select the window in which the link will open if clicked.
target.title: Open Links

cta.helpvalue: Free users are limited to 3 content items. Upgrade to remove the limit!

animation.description: Select the transition type between images.
animation.title: Animation Type

autoplay.description: If on, the images will slide until the user interacts with the pagination.
autoplay.title: Slideshow

autoplayInterval.description: Set for how many seconds an image is displayed.
autoplayInterval.title: Slideshow Time

contentHeightPadding.description: Specify the canvas padding on height, to display the pagination outside of the images area.
contentHeightPadding.title: Canvas Height Padding

contentWidthPadding.description: Specify the canvas padding on sides, to display the navigation outside of the images area.
contentWidthPadding.title: Canvas Sides Padding

kenburnsOn.description: Set if the slides should scale while visible.
kenburnsOn.title: Kenburns

showArrows.description: If on the arrows will show.
showArrows.title: Display Navigation

showPag.description: If on the pagination will show.
showPag.title: Display Pagination

arrowBackFillColor.description: Select the color for the button's fill.
arrowBackFillColor.title: Fill Color

arrowBackFillHoverColor.description: Select the color for the button's fill, on mouse hover.
arrowBackFillHoverColor.title: Fill Hover Color

arrowBackRadius.description: Set the button’s shape by changing it’s radius.
arrowBackRadius.title: Button Radius

arrowBackStrokeColor.description: Select the color for the button's stroke.
arrowBackStrokeColor.title: Stroke Color

arrowBackStrokeHoverColor.description: Select the color for the button's stroke, on mouse hover.
arrowBackStrokeHoverColor.title: Stroke Hover Color

arrowBackStrokeSize.description: Set the thickness of the stroke.
arrowBackStrokeSize.title: Stroke Thickness

arrowMargin.description: Add a padding between the margins of the widget and the arrows.
arrowMargin.title: Position Padding

arrowPosition.description: Select the position of the navigation.
arrowPosition.title: Position

arrowSize.description: Define the size of the arrows.
arrowSize.title: Button Size

arrowSymbol.description: Select the symbol of the navigation arrows.
arrowSymbol.title: Symbol

arrowSymbolColor.description: Select the color for the button's symbol.
arrowSymbolColor.title: Symbol Color

arrowSymbolHoverColor.description: Select the color for the button's symbol, on mouse hover.
arrowSymbolHoverColor.title: Symbol Hover Color

pagBulletFillColor.description: Select the color for the button's fill.
pagBulletFillColor.title: Fill Color

pagBulletFillHoverColor.description: Select the color for the button's fill, on mouse hover.
pagBulletFillHoverColor.title: Fill Hover Color

pagBulletFillSelectedColor.description: Select the color for the button's fill when selected.
pagBulletFillSelectedColor.title: Fill Selected Color

pagBulletFontColor.description: Select the color for the text.
pagBulletFontColor.title: Font Color

pagBulletFontHoverColor.description: Select the color for the text, on mouse hover.
pagBulletFontHoverColor.title: Font Hover Color

pagBulletFontSelectedColor.description: Select the color for the text, when selected.
pagBulletFontSelectedColor.title: Font Selected Color

pagBulletPadding.description: Add a padding around the buttons.
pagBulletPadding.title: Buttons Padding

pagBulletRadius.description: Set the button’s shape by changing it’s radius.
pagBulletRadius.title: Button Radius

pagBulletStrokeColor.description: Select the color for the button's stroke.
pagBulletStrokeColor.title: Stroke Color

pagBulletStrokeHoverColor.description: Select the color for the button's stroke, on mouse hover.
pagBulletStrokeHoverColor.title: Stroke Hover Color

pagBulletStrokeSelectedColor.description: Select the color for the button's stroke when selected.
pagBulletStrokeSelectedColor.title: Stroke Selected Color

pagBulletStrokeSize.description: Set the thickness for the button's stroke.
pagBulletStrokeSize.title: Button Stroke Thickness

pagPadding.description: Add a padding between the margins of the widget and the pagination.
pagPadding.title: Position Padding

pagRadius.description: Set the pagination's shape by changing it's radius.
pagRadius.title: Radius

pagStrokeSize.description: Set the thickness of the stroke.
pagStrokeSize.title: Stroke Thickness

pagVertical.description: If true, the bullets are positioned on top of each other.
pagVertical.title: Orientation

failure.message: There was an error communicating with Widgetic.

versions.releaseNotes: Added to Cloudflare Apps recommendation engine

proposedApp.title: Image Slider
proposedApp.shortDescription: Add a slideshow gallery to your site.
proposedApp.longDescription:
**About** An effective way to showcase your images in a compact space is to group them as a slideshow. This way customers can engage with your content freely. Our app is perfect for displaying many hero images at once. This makes it easier to promote several products or campaigns at the same time. The pagination can be toggled between vertical and horizontal orientation. Additionally you can enable next-prev navigation to give users more control.
**Standard Features** * Use an existing layout or create a new one. * Top customer support. * Add up to 3 photos.
proposedApp.author: Widgetic
